item.title: A Work In Progress
item.description: Lorem ipsum Hi! I’m Bryan. I’m an incoming software engineer at Google. I completed my BS at Cornell University in Chemical Engineering and Computer Science with a minor in Electrical Engineering, and a Masters of Engineering shortly after. My interests include machine learning, control of dynamical systems, robust optimization, MEMS, algorithms, sequential decision making, and computational chemistry. Outside of academics I’m an avid hiker and reader. I currently live in Ithaca, NY.
